movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief enters the dreams of others to steal their deepest secrets.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman, with the help of his allies and Gotham's police, tries to rid the city of crime.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The story depicts several decades in the life of Forrest Gump, a slow-witted but kind-hearted and athletically-talented man.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: Various interconnected stories of crime and redemption in Los Angeles.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.description: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A young hobbit, Frodo Baggins, and his companions set out on a quest to destroy the One Ring and prevent the dark lord Sauron from conquering the world.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: The Usual Suspects
movies.description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: The Pianist
movies.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

movies.title: The Bourne Identity
movies.description: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and without memory, then races to elude assassins and recover from amnesia.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief enters the dreams of others to steal their deepest secrets.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

movies.title: The Terminator
movies.description: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.description: A quirky hotel concierge and his protégé team up to prove their innocence after the latter is framed for murder.

movies.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movies.description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

movies.title: The Sixth Sense
movies.description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

movies.title: The Revenant
movies.description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.
